title: Nakula Lyrics Vallinam Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer: Nakul, Andrea Jeremiah
Song: Nakula
Movie: Vallinam
Music: S. Thaman
Lyrics: Parvathi

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Alai nuni varai thazhumbudhu nurai
valai virithudu ila manam irai
sariya idhu nadu narambilum
pattu therippadhu sarithaan vidu
Alai nuni varai thazhumbudhu nurai
valai virithudu ..

Iravum pagalaa, thuzhiyum kadalaa
manal manalaa manalaa punalaa
uyira udalaa asalaa nagalaa
yenil edhu nee nakulaa

Sevilin sedhilaa adhilum adhilaa
medhu medhuvaa adikkum puyalaa
adhilaa idhilaa yedhilum mudhalaa
therivadhelaam nakulaa

Kaipidi alavaa, kaikulle aadava
eppadi marupen enakkenna adamaa
un idai valamaa en viral balamaa
nenjukul kodhithaal adhan peyar juramaa

Kangalai vidavaa kal enna valuvaa
kelvikku padhilum urakathail tharavaa

Ullangai thodavaa un mattam nadavaa
un mutham padhindhaal adhai padhainidava

Alai nuni varai thazhumbudhu nurai
valai virithudu ila manam irai
sariya idhu nadu narambilum

Idhu varai pandhaadum ennam
dhaayam pola uruttiya pinnum .palamurai
aadi aadi naanum aatam palagidanum
oru sol podhume ennai mudukkaa
pathu pakkam thandhaal edhai padikkaa
innum innum vali irukka?? uyir edukkaa

ven andhi niramaa, veyilin gunamaa
un mudi parakkum tharikketta thanamaa

neenthida varuma, thathalikanumaa
un vizhi kulathil karai pidipadumaa

theekuchi thirala, muttidum thanalaa
un mugam jolikkum thaga thaga porulaa
konjam nee agala maaridu nakulaa
ippadi virattum kapadikku padhilaa English Translation
I tried my best :)
[english lyric]
